___backend_version.description: Backend version in the form X.X.X

___credits_required.description: Backend requires credits to run a job (true/false)

___coupling_map.description: Array grouping qubits that are physically coupled together on the backend

___n_registers.description: Number of register slots available for feedback (if conditional is true)

___register_map.description: An array of dimension n_qubits X n_registers that specifies whether a qubit can store a measurement in a certain register slot

___configurable.description: Backend is configurable, if the backend is a simulator (true/false)

___display_name.description: Alternate name field for the backend

___gates.description: List of basis gates on the backend

___basis_gates.description: List of basis gates names on the backend

___parametric_pulses.description: A list of available parametric pulse shapes

___meas_map.description: Grouping of measurement which are multiplexed

___dt.description: Time discretization for the drive and U channels

___qubit_lo_range.description: Frequency range for the qubit LO

___osc.description: Number of levels for each oscillator mode

___h_str.description: The Hamiltonian in machine readable form

___acquisition_latency.description: Array of dimension n_qubits x n_registers. Latency (in units of dt) to write a measurement result from qubit n into register slot m.

___meas_levels.description: Available measurement levels on the backend

___channel_bandwidth.description: Bandwidth of all channels (qubit,measurement and U)

___conditional_latency.description: Array of dimension n_channels [d->u->m] x n_registers. Latency (in units of dt) to do a conditional operation on channel n from register slot m

___u_channel_lo.description: Relationship of the U Channel LO's in terms of the qubit LO's

___dtm.description: Time discretization for the measurement channels

___meas_lo_range.description: Frequency range for the measurement LO

___backend_version.description: Backend version in the form X.X.X

___credits_required.description: Backend requires credits to run a job (true/false)

___coupling_map.description: Array grouping qubits that are physically coupled together on the backend

___n_registers.description: Number of register slots available for feedback (if conditional is true)

___register_map.description: An array of dimension n_qubits X n_registers that specifies whether a qubit can store a measurement in a certain register slot

___configurable.description: Backend is configurable, if the backend is a simulator (true/false)

___display_name.description: Alternate name field for the backend

___gates.description: List of basis gates on the backend

___name.description: The gate name as it will be referred to in QASM

___qasm_def.description: Definition of this gate in terms of QASM primitives U and CX

___parameters.description: Variable names for the gate parameters (if any)

___coupling_map.description: List of qubit groupings which are coupled by this gate

___latency_map.description: An array of dimension len(coupling_map) X n_registers that specifies (1 - fast, 0 - slow) the register latency conditional operations on the gate

___conditional.description: This specified gate supports conditional operations (true/false). If this is not specified, then the gate inherits the conditional property of the backend.

___basis_gates.description: List of basis gates names on the backend

___parametric_pulses.description: A list of available parametric pulse shapes

___meas_map.description: Grouping of measurement which are multiplexed

___dt.description: Time discretization for the drive and U channels

___qubit_lo_range.description: Frequency range for the qubit LO

___osc.description: Number of levels for each oscillator mode

___h_str.description: The Hamiltonian in machine readable form
